Class Connect4ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Connect4ComputerPlayer

  • public class Connect4ComputerPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int difficulty
      set difficulty of the bot with this variable 0 being the easiest, the CPU will never block your connect 4 on purpose 10 being the hardest, the CPU will almost always block your connect 4 on purpose
      private Connect4 game 
      private boolean hasGoneFlag 
      private int horizMatching 
      private int leftDiagMatching 
      private int rightDiagMatching 
      private int verticalMatching

        private final int difficulty
        set difficulty of the bot with this variable 0 being the easiest, the CPU will never block your connect 4 on purpose 10 being the hardest, the CPU will almost always block your connect 4 on purpose

      • checkForBlock

        public void checkForBlock()
        CPU checks if it needs to block a player chance, RNG is used to make the CPU miss a block. Change the if (random > int) range to change difficulty.

      • chooseRandom

        CPU Chooses a random column to place a token
